Mod Version: 1.0.0
*** Example Load Order *** - Core - Misc. Robots - Misc. Robots++ - Misc. Robots+++
Robots+++ Changes The Following Bots: --- Kitchen Bot Separated into kitchen and planter bot. The first one cooks and butchers, the second one tends the plants.
--- Crafter Bot Separated into smithing, tailoring, and crafting bots. Each can only do their own things.
--- Builder Bot Separated into builder and miner bot. The former can build and destroy stuff (also remove trees when necessary for building), the latter only mines.
To contact me please use the github page. I'm not promising any quick responses.
